item.title: Defying Trump Executive Order, California Forces Girls Into Basketball Playoff With Boy
item.description: Speedy action from the Department of Education’s Office of Civil Rights would protect girls from playing a boy who dominates girls in basketball.

item.title: Elbridge Colby Is The Right Man To Carry Out Trump’s America First Mandate
item.description: Elbridge Colby will actually do what Americans have given Trump a clear mandate to do, and for that reason, the D.C. blob is desperate to stop him.

item.title: Zeldin To Claw Back $20 Billion That Biden’s EPA Dumped Into Leftist ‘Climate’ Groups
item.description: EPA Secretary Lee Zeldin said he reviewed "stunning" documents about Biden's scheme to dump $20 billion into leftist "climate" groups.
